name: ASTRO COMMAND
description:
BE AN ASTRO COMMANDER.

ALL ALONE IN OUTER SPACE. IN THE DARKNESS, LIFE DIDN'T GIVE YOU LEMONS... IT GAVE YOU A LASER CANNON. 

TAKE COMMAND OVER THIS CANNON AND BLAST YOUR WAY TO SUCCESS! SEE IF YOU CAN BE THE BEST GODDAMN ASTRO COMMANDER IN THE GALAXY

GAME FEATURES

- DIFFICULTY SETTING ( EASY, MEDIUM, RANKED )   

- SAVES YOUR HIGH-SCORE

-  ONLINE RANKING 

CONTROLLS

- LEFT CLICK TO SHOOT RED LASERS                                                                              

- RIGHT CLICK TO SHOOT BLUE LAZERS                                                                       

- MIDDLE CLICK TO BLAST AWAY WITH THE MEGA LASER
